name: Dark Dreams: Nightmares in bed
description:
A horror game in development, where you must survive til 7 am, when your alarm wakes you, with SCARECROW in a dark forest. This game was inspired by TJOC anf Fnaf...

"Tomorrow's a big day", your DAD says to you i bed, "sleep well son..."

In your good sleep, you wake up in the middle of the night in a completely dark forest with only a flashlight to let you see. This is just a dream, just a dream, you think hard to wake up, but is it really a dream ? You start to doubt when you hear sounds coming from the bushes. What was that noise ? Who's there ? Is this real ? Someone coming towards me..... Where am I ?

WAKE UP!!

HOW TO PLAY : 

  • Use WASD move around but BEWARE HE can hear you walking on the grass
  • Use SPACE to jump (it has no use, it's just there)
  • Use L to close your eyes when you hear HIM running towards you and wait until you can't hear him anymore (IMPORTANT)

UPCOMING :

  • Four other characters (Shadow, Psycho Clown, Dark Roots, and ghghggfqfzsj!!), with different ways to defeat them, and with different scaring techniques.
  • Four other nights with different maps
  • Game menu, (better sounds), small aclip animations to introduce and end the game

So support this game by giving feedback so I can make it better. And follow the devlog to see the brand new exiting updates...

ARE YOU TOO SCARED TO PLAY ? Hahahahahahah
